QueryResult.text: SELECT PE.ID, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION, PE.PERMISSION_CODE, PE.PERMISSION_VALUE, PE.PERMISSION_ID, PE.CREATED_DATE, PE.CREATED_BY, PE.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, PE.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS PE WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS' AND NLS.PK_ID = PE.ID
